content: #HeelsFanBut… As I watched the footage of Fox getting emotional in the locker room after the game last weekend, I couldn’t help but think “If you’re this passionate about the teammates you had and the run you went on, why not try to convince everybody to come back…” Is there any doubt that Kentucky would be a juggernaut if even two out of their three frosh stars returned for another season? Kentucky is ALWAYS gonna be damn-near a juggernaut…
